name: com.trilitech.tezos-unity-sdk
description:
Unity SDK for Tezos: Seamlessly Integrate Tezos with Your Unity Projects

This SDK empowers developers to easily incorporate Tezos blockchain functionality into Unity games or applications. Designed for efficiency and ease of use, it's the perfect tool for bringing blockchain capabilities to your Unity creations.

For detailed documentation, visit: https://docs.tezos.com/unity/

Get Involved:
- Join our vibrant community on Discord: https://discord.gg/tezos
- Explore funding opportunities: https://grants.tezos.foundation/

samples.description:
A set of tutorials showing how to use the Tezos Unity SDK, split into multiple scenes, each demonstrating a different feature.
The scenes are easy to follow and are well commented to help you begin your journey with Tezos and Unity.

For more information, you can also check out the documentation at https://docs.tezos.com/unity/
